Ben jij een ondernemer met een goed idee: Are you an entrepreneur with a good idea for an app or web application, but you have no idea where to start?
Met mijn bedrijf RoamerSoft help ik jou: With my company RoamerSoft I help you as an entrepreneur to build custom web applications and cross-platform mobile apps that help you to achieve your goals.
Daarbij bied ik je een <strong>all-in-on: I offer you an all-in-one solution, in which I, as a full stack developer, take care of the front-end development, backend development and server deployment in order to completely unburden you.

Naast reizen heb ik ook een grote passie: Besides travelling, I have a great passion for software development. Using the latest techniques to develop applications step by step to ensure they achieve the underlying goals.
Vanaf 2019 begon ik mijn twee grootste p: In 2019, I started combining my two biggest passions and founded my one-man company RoamerSoft. With RoamerSoft I create fully customized web applications and cross-platform mobile apps for (starting) entrepreneurs and SMEs.
Dit doe ik als <strong>Digital Nomad</st: As a Digital Nomad I do this 100% remotely and from all corners of the world. For example, I have done successful projects from Southeast Asia, the Canary Islands, Mexico and the United States.
Als digital nomad heb succesvol reizen e: As a digital nomad, I have successfully combined travel and software development!

Het slaat op mijn leefstijl. Ik wil mij: It refers to my lifestyle. I don't want to commit myself to a fixed place or country, I like to go wherever I want. “Roaming the world” is one of my biggest passions. When I combined this with my other great passion, software development, I ended up with RoamerSoft.
Yes, ik leef als een zogenaamde <strong>: Yes, I live as a so-called digital nomad. This means that I do not commit myself to a fixed location and often work from abroad.
Hoe zorg je voor optimaal contact met je: How do you ensure optimal communication with your customers?
De technieken van tegenwoordig maken fys: Today's techniques make physical contact moments superfluous. Of course you can call me , but for many customers emails, WhatsApp and video calls are the best solution.
Wat is een full stack developer?: What is a full stack developer?
Als full stack developer kan ik zowel de: As a full stack developer I can realize both the frontend (what the customer sees) and the backend (the central heart of the system). For example, I create a so-called API on the backend that can provide frontend with the necessary data.
In welke programmeertalen ben je gespeci: What programming languages do you specialise in?
Programmeertalen als C#, Java en PHP zij: Programming languages such as C#, Java and PHP are anything but foreign to me, but I am mainly specialized on TypeScript and Node.js. I have a lot of experience with frameworks such as Angular, Ionic and NestJS.
In de begintijd van de apps moest je voo: In the early days of the apps, you had to develop a separate app for each system (Android, iOS etc.). Nowadays, a cross-platform app offers the solution for most projects. This allows me to develop an app with one codebase that runs on both Android and Apple iOS. Kill two birds with one stone!
Hoe zit het met serverbeheer en onderhou: What about server management and maintenance?
Voor het beheer van en onderhoud aan je: I have put together various packages for the management and maintenance of your (backend) server and/or app store pages. Ask for the possibilities.
Hoe zorg je dat ik niet te afhankelijk v: How do you ensure that I do not become too dependent on you?
Een goede software engineer denkt toekom: A good software engineer is future-oriented and ensures that his product is expandable and transferable. Think of clear comments in the code and clear to the point documentation. In addition, I develop in the popular technique 'Docker' which makes it possible to move the software plug and play to another server.
Hij neemt je goed mee in zijn planning &: He guides you well in his planning & progress and most importantly, delivers quality.
In welke uithoek van de wereld Bas ook z: No matter where in the world Bas is, we can always rely on RoamerSoft.
